title: Developer Advocate
content:
About the role
Reporting to the CEO, our first developer advocate will help developers learn about Chalk and understand the best ways to integrate Machine Learning Infrastructure. You will focus on engaging and supporting the MLOps community. This is your opportunity to join us in-person as an early employee and make a significant impact at a high-growth start-up.
What you will do

Write blog posts and other technical content for Chalk users and prospective users
Connect with like-minded developers and educate them about Chalk’s platform 
Engage the developer community through online channels
Represent Chalk at developer conferences, events, and hackathons
Be a point of contact and become an expert in ML infrastructure
Create presentations, videos, and demos

What we’re looking for

Professional experience as a software, data, or machine learning engineer
Understanding of Machine Learning Ops/Infrastructure
Strong knowledge of Python, bonus points: interest in Rust or C++
Experience in the open-source community and community building
Experience with public speaking
Ability to communicate with both technical and non-technical individuals and groups
Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or relevant technical field

Inclusivity
Chalk is an equal-opportunity employer. We value diversity and inclusion and provide reasonable accommodations to anyone needing individualized support.
